Sentencas: Single cell solid oxide fuel cells using Ni-YSZ and Co-YSZ anodes were tested in H-2, CH4, H2S/H-2 and H2S/CH4 fuel mixtures.
Titulo: SOFC anodes for direct oxidation of hydrogen and methane fuels containing H2S

Sentencas: Their performance was found to quickly degrade in dry CH4 due to carbon deposition and lifting of the anode from the electrolyte.
Titulo: SOFC anodes for direct oxidation of hydrogen and methane fuels containing H2S

Sentencas: In contrast, hydrogen or methane containing H2S showed an increase in exchange current densities when compared to H-2,M/YSZILSM,air systems (M = Ni or Cc) despite having less optimal anode microstructure.
Titulo: SOFC anodes for direct oxidation of hydrogen and methane fuels containing H2S

Sentencas: Conversion from metal to metal-sulfide in the presence of H2S produced large, dense metal-sulfide particles surrounded by YSZ, thus decreasing the triple-phase boundary.
Titulo: SOFC anodes for direct oxidation of hydrogen and methane fuels containing H2S

Sentencas: Furthermore, CoS-based anodes showed phase segregation and densification toward the electrolyte.
Titulo: SOFC anodes for direct oxidation of hydrogen and methane fuels containing H2S

Sentencas: Despite this, long-term testing at eta(a) = 0.5 V of the H2S/CH4,CoS-YSZNSZ/LSM,air system showed no signs of degradation of the anode over a 6-day period.
Titulo: SOFC anodes for direct oxidation of hydrogen and methane fuels containing H2S

Sentencas: Only after removal of H2S from the H2S/CH4 stream did the CoS-anode reduce back to Co, signifying H2S is required to maintain the metal-sulfide active anode.
Titulo: SOFC anodes for direct oxidation of hydrogen and methane fuels containing H2S
